text.section:
Except as provided under subsection (b) of this section and § 17-503 of this subtitle, a person shall obtain a permit from the Department before:
Offering to provide a test to detect the amount of cholesterol in an individual's blood; and
Conducting the cholesterol test outside a permanently located medical laboratory issued a permit or excepted from a permit under Subtitle 2 of this title.

A cholesterol testing permit is not required under this subtitle for a medical laboratory that:
Is licensed under Subtitle 2 of this title; and
As set forth in the license, provides tests or services in the discipline of chemistry or health awareness.
